attributes.action: i would like to know why poeple who live in rented accomadation can have the rent payed buy the benifits dept when they are out of work,but poeple who buying there house get no help at all.these poeple are trying not to be a burdon on the the state and better themselfs.and may i add that 8 out of 10 of these homeowners are the ones who pay the taxes to pay the poeple who will not help themselfs.its about time this goverment help the poeple who count.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
